commit.message:
re PR fortran/60526 (Accepts-invalid: Variable name same as type name)

2016-02-14  Thomas Koenig  <tkoenig@gcc.gnu.org>

	PR fortran/60526
	PR bootstrap/69816

2016-02-14  Thomas Koenig  <tkoenig@gcc.gnu.org>

	PR fortran/60526
	PR bootstrap/69816
	* gfortran.dg/type_decl_4.f90:  Removed.

From-SVN: r233411
